text:
When I try to edit a new article of the Forum publication which is part of the 
Demo (http://demo.wyona.org/lenya/forum/introduction.html) I see this:

  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> 
- <rc:exception xmlns:xsp="http://apache.org/xsp" 
xmlns:rc="http://www.lenya.org/2002/rc">
- <rc:generic-exception>
  <rc:filename>/home/wyona/build/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-
jdk14/webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs/forum/content/authoring/articles/1057241232807/in
dex.xml</rc:filename> 
  </rc:generic-exception>
  </rc:exception>
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
egli@apache.org
text:
The forum publication has been removed from CVS and has been replaced by the
blog publication, where Bitflux is supplied as an editor.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: I reported this one and close it now.
